casebody.data:
Crowe, Appellant, v. Bumford et al., Appellees.

[Cite as Crowe v. Bumford (1970), 22 Ohio St. 2d 78.]

(No. 68-361 Decided April 22, 1970.) *79Mr. John L. Roof, for appellant. Mr. Frank Wiedemann and Mr. William Wiedemann, for appellees.

Chief Justice Taft participated in this case which was, however, decided after his death.

 Per Curiam.

The judgment of the Court of Appeals is reversed on authority of Clouston v. Remlinger Oldsmobile Cadillac, Inc. (1970), 22 Ohio St. 2d 65.

Judgment reversed.

O’Neill, C. J., Schneder, Herbert, Duncan and Corrigan, JJ., concur.* Matthias, J., not participating.
